items: Is Infrastructure as Code (IaC) used for all resource provisioning?
Are resources deployed across multiple Availability Zones for high availability?
Is the Principle of Least Privilege (PoLP) applied to IAM roles and policies?
Are auto-scaling policies configured based on real-time metrics?
Is cost monitoring and alerting set up to prevent budget overruns?
Are cloud-native monitoring and logging tools (e.g., CloudWatch, Stackdriver) enabled?
